arts.ttl: Player Ratings: Napoli 2-0 Torino – McTominay Unstoppable
arts.sum: Napoli steamrolled past mid-table Torino to go three points clear of defending Serie A champions Inter at the table's summit. Antonio Conte's high-flying side cruised to a 2-0 victory at Stadio Diego Maradona to get closer to a second Scudetto in three years. arts.ttl: Serie A Preview: Napoli vs Torino – Team News, Line-ups & Prediction
arts.sum: Napoli will put their Serie A title hopes on the line when they take on mid-table Torino at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona later this evening. Level on points with defending champions Inter at the table's summit, Antonio Conte's charges remain firmly in contention for their second Scudetto in three years. The post Serie A Preview: Napoli vs Torino – Team News, Line-ups & Prediction appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.
